---
title: "Collapsible Tree"

output: html_document
---
Example of a callapsible tree using [Active Lives Survey Activites](https://www.sportengland.org/research/active-lives-survey/measuring-sport-and-activity/)

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(fingertipsR)
library(collapsibleTree)
library(RColorBrewer)

df <- read.csv("input/Navigating Active Lives Adult dataset - Activities.csv")

```


```{r al}
collapsibleTree(linkLength = 200, df, hierarchy = c("Broad.Activity.Categories", "Activities", "Disciplines"), height = 1200, width = 1200, tooltip = TRUE, fillByLevel = TRUE)
```
